dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, so I was just reading something pretty cool about, um, upcoming holidays.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, so I was just reading something pretty cool about, um, upcoming holidays.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? Spill! Where are we talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? Spill! Where are we talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, picture this: Kazakhstan. July 2025. They're actually getting an extra day off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, picture this: Kazakhstan. July twenty twenty five. They're actually getting an extra day off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In July 2025, Kazakhstanis will get an extra day off.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan, huh? [overlaps] Interesting. What's the, uh, occasion?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan, huh? Interesting. What's the, uh, occasion?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's for something called Capital City Day. It's usually celebrated on July 6th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's for something called Capital City Day. It's usually celebrated on July sixth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In July 2025, citizens will enjoy long weekend holidays in honor of Capital City Day, one of Kazakhstan's main public holidays. It™s celebrated on July 6...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Capital City Day. Okay. What's the significance of that, like, historically?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Capital City Day. Okay. What's the significance of that, like, historically?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Good question! It marks when they moved their capital from Almaty to Astana back in 1998.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good question! It marks when they moved their capital from Almaty to Astana back in nineteen ninety eight.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It™s celebrated on July 6 and marks the transfer of the capital from Almaty to Astana in 1998.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, Astana. So, like, are there big celebrations for it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, Astana. So, like, are there big celebrations for it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely! Huge festivities, especially in Astana. Concerts, festivals, street fairs, the whole nine yards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely! Huge festivities, especially in Astana. Concerts, festivals, street fairs, the whole nine yards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Across the country, large-scale festivities are held, especially in Astana: concerts, festivals, street fairs, and exhibitions are planned.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds, um, pretty lively. But you said an *extra* day off? How does that work?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds, um, pretty lively. But you said an extra day off? How does that work?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the 6th, that's a Sunday. So, under their "Law on Holidays," the day off, uh, gets legally moved to Monday, the 7th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the sixth, that's a Sunday. So, under their Law on Holidays, the day off, uh, gets legally moved to Monday, the seventh.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since July 6 falls on a Sunday, the day off is legally moved to Monday, July 7, under the "Law on Holidays".

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Ah, so they get a long weekend!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, so they get a long weekend!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! So it's July 5th, 6th, and the 7th. Three consecutive days off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! So it's July fifth, sixth, and the seventh. Three consecutive days off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This gives citizens three consecutive days off: July 5"7.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Man, that's, like, super handy. Wish we had that kind of foresight here, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Man, that's, like, super handy. Wish we had that kind of foresight here, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Definitely helps with planning your leisure time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Definitely helps with planning your leisure time.
